code: import React from'react';import{Button,Container,Form,Nav,Navbar,NavDropdown}from'react-bootstrap';import{Link,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{logoutUser}from'../../userSlice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=_ref=>{let{setSearch}=_ref;const navigate=useNavigate();const dispatch=useDispatch();const{userInfo}=useSelector(state=>state.user);const handleLogout=()=>{dispatch(logoutUser());navigate('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{expand:"lg",bg:"primary",variant:"dark",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar.Brand,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:"Notes App"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar.Toggle,{"aria-controls":"navbarScroll"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Navbar.Collapse,{id:"navbarScroll",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form,{className:"m-auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Form.Control,{type:"search",placeholder:"Search",className:"me-2","aria-label":"Search",onChange:e=>setSearch(e.target.value)})}),userInfo?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Nav,{className:"me-auto my-2 my-lg-0",style:{maxHeight:'100px'},navbarScroll:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"mynotes",children:"My Notes"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(NavDropdown,{title:userInfo.name,id:"navbarScrollingDropdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavDropdown.Item,{href:"/profile",children:"My Profile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavDropdown.Divider,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavDropdown.Item,{onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav,{className:"me-auto my-2 my-lg-0",style:{maxHeight:'100px'},navbarScroll:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:"Login"})})})]})]})});};export default Header;
